| Needs 'noapic acpi=off' boot parameters, which causes IRQ crowding and on the occasional boot the sound card is not detected because of a conflict with the parallel port. System doesn't power down after shutdown (bug <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=43961|#43961]]</nowiki>). The default X driver is the open source "radeon", in which DRI (and 3d acceleration) don't work. If powernowd is not disabled, a complete system freeze usually happens within an hour (bug <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+bug/46470|#46470]]</nowiki>).
